    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       Horror of Race on Film &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>
    <div class="guideattr" id="guideattr">
     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">
      Last Updated: Oct 20, 2016
     </span>
     <span class="guideurl">
      URL: http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/racehorrorfilm
     </span>

      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox22096048">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22096048">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22096048">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22096048">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
          </p>

     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox22096051">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22096051">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22096051">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do locate scholarly articles and book chapters?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22096051">
          <div id="boxatt22096051" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25572813">
              <a id="link_25572813" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=ufh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25572813,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Horror of Race on Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12766292}); ">
               Communication and Mass Media Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier database of scholarly and trade journals and books in media and communication and related areas. Some full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise, use the Get It links to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25572812">
              <a id="link_25572812" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25572812,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Horror of Race on Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25572809">
              <a id="link_25572809" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=f3h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25572809,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Horror of Race on Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19008881}); ">
               Film and Television Literature Index with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database of scholarly journals, trade journals, books, and more in the areas of television and film.  Most full text is linked directly in the database; otherwise use the Check for Full Text buttons to check for full text online or in the library.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25572814">
              <a id="link_25572814" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25572814,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Horror of Race on Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Google Books is a rich source of full-text documents (books and other materials) published prior to 1923 that are now in the public domain.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25572808">
              <a id="link_25572808" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25572808,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Horror of Race on Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25573106">
              <a id="link_25573106" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25573106,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Horror of Race on Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12766128}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A substantive archive of approximately 15 scholarly film studies journals, all full text. In most cases, the last 3-5 years are not included in the archive. Full text journals include Cinema Journal, Film History, Film Quarterly, and Journal of Film and Video,
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25572810">
              <a id="link_25572810" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25572810,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Horror of Race on Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12766286}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier scholarly index, with numerous links to full text, to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25572869">
              <a id="link_25572869" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.aspx?direct=true&amp;db=mzh&amp;AN=2008130213&amp;login.asp&amp;site=ehost-live&amp;scope=site" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25572869,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Horror of Race on Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25572869}); ">
               sample article
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25572811">
              <a id="link_25572811" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://newfirstsearch.oclc.org/done=http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu//;dbname=worldcat;fsip" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25572811,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Horror of Race on Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344495}); ">
               WorldCat
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search catalogs from libraries across the country and around the globe.  Items owned by Trexler Library show a Muhlenberg College Library icon.  Request items not owned by Trexler Library directly through WorldCat using the ILL (Interlibrary Loan) button. Items generally take 2-10 days to arrive.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox22096050">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22096050">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22096050">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Evaluating sources for scholarly content
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22096050">
          <div id="boxatt22096050" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link25572807">
              <a id="link_25572807" href="http://ulrichsweb.serialssolutions.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25572807,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Horror of Race on Film', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974165}); ">
               UlrichsWeb Periodicals Directory
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Database that provides bibliographic information, including if a journal is peer-reviewed or not, on international periodicals. It covers all subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5841088" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox22096053">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22096053">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22096053">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22096053">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            Trexler Library's
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt22096053" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox22096054">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="22096054">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title22096054">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content22096054">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt22096054" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>

     <div class="balloon_body" id="descpopupcontent">

       <img alt="Loading" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/indicator.gif" />
       &nbsp; Loading...
      </p>
     </div>
    </div>
    <img alt="Tip" style="top:-200px; left:-500px;" id="tippointer" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/tippointer.gif" />
    <div id="popupinfo" class="popup" style="visibility: visible; top:-200px; left:-500px;">
     <div class="popup_head">
      <table align="right" border="0">
       <tr>
        <td valign="bottom" height="18">
         <a href="#" onclick="return hideAlert('popupinfo')">
          <img alt="Close" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/window_close_grey.gif" border="0" align="absbottom" />
         </a>
        </td>
       </tr>
      </table>
      <div id="popupinfotitle" style="display:inline;">
       <h6>
        More Information
       </h6>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="popup_body">
      <div id="popupinfocontent" style="display:inline;">
       <img alt="Loading" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/indicator.gif" />
       &nbsp; Loading...
      </div>
      <br />
      <center>
       <a href="#" onclick="hideAlert('popupinfo'); return false;">
        Close
       </a>
      </center>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div id="dp" style="width:850px;">
   &nbsp;
  </div>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   cssdropdown.startchrome("tabs12");
  </script>

   SpringTrack.trackPage({ 
                        st_type : content_config.hitsource,
